Company;Nature and extent of significant restrictions
Towarzystwo Ubezpieczen i Reasekuracji WARTA S.A. und Towarzystwo Zycie;Under the consortium agreement with a minority shareholder, a dividend or a capital decrease may only be resolved with that shareholder's approval.
Ubezpieczen WARTA S.A., both Warsaw, Poland;the agreement specifies that the shares held by the Group are subject to a restriction on disposal.
E+S Riickversicherung AG;The sale and transfer of shares of E+S Riickversicherung AG are subject to endorsement and must be approved by the companyâ€™s supervisory board. The supervisory board has the right to issue or refuse approval and is not obliged to give any reasons in the event of a refusal.
